entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:54 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
